func.title: GetPlayerType

param.name: player
param.desc: Number of the player whose type you want to retrieve.

func.desc:
Returns the type of a player. Possible values are:
Constant Value Description
C4PT_User 1 User-controlled player.
C4PT_Script 2 Script-controlled player; i.e. AI player.
func.remark: If the specified player number is invalid, the return value is 0.
In 9.0 OC this function was deprecated, because it can be retrieved from a player directly with GetPlayer by accessing the proplist property "Type".

example.text: Scenario script: when a script player joins, an object of definition SomeAIController is created (owned by the joining script player). This object might now control all clonks owned by this player.
